desc.en: 雖然成功進入了，但生命守護者在瞬間被方舟內部的敵人團團包圍住了。船內的學生立刻衝出來，展開保護船隻的防禦戰。
desc.jp: 雖然成功進入了，但生命守護者在瞬間被方舟內部的敵人團團包圍住了。船內的學生立刻衝出來，展開保護船隻的防禦戰。
desc.zh_cn: 虽然成功进入了，但生命守护者在瞬间被方舟内部的敌人团团包围住了。船内的学生立刻冲出来，展开保护船只的防御战。

desc.en: 雖然眾人都沒什麼事，但是陽葵等人報告稱方舟損壞嚴重，不僅動力系統失效，通訊和運算模組也受到了不小的影響。
desc.jp: 雖然眾人都沒什麼事，但是陽葵等人報告稱方舟損壞嚴重，不僅動力系統失效，通訊和運算模組也受到了不小的影響。
desc.zh_cn: 虽然众人都没什么事，但是{cf阳葵}等人报告称方舟损坏严重，不仅动力系统失效，通讯和运算模块也受到了不小的影响。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: 畢竟是在敵方的大本營裡頭。很快，敵人蜂擁而至，但似乎卻沒有合適的作戰力量。
desc.jp: 畢竟是在敵方的大本營裡頭。很快，敵人蜂擁而至，但似乎卻沒有合適的作戰力量。
desc.zh_cn: 毕竟是在敌方的大本营里头。很快，敌人蜂拥而至，但似乎却没有合适的作战力量。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

hobby.jp: 今日の運勢の確認、オカルト全般
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物

desc.en: 對策委員會主動請纓，表示將協助作戰。綾音同意並說明將提供導航。
desc.jp: 對策委員會主動請纓，表示將協助作戰。綾音同意並說明將提供導航。
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}主动请缨，表示将协助作战。{cf绫音}同意并说明将提供导航。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: 美食研究會主動請纓，表示要在船上炸翻天、探尋宇宙美食。亞子對眾人何時登船一事有些驚訝，但立刻接受了眾人的幫助。
desc.jp: 美食研究會主動請纓，表示要在船上炸翻天、探尋宇宙美食。亞子對眾人何時登船一事有些驚訝，但立刻接受了眾人的幫助。
desc.zh_cn: {cn美食研究会}主动请缨，表示要在船上炸翻天、探寻宇宙美食。{cf亚子}对众人何时登船一事有些惊讶，但立刻接受了众人的帮助。

hobby.zh_cn_cn: 制作黑暗料理、享用黑暗料理

desc.en: 遊戲開發部（愛麗絲尚未醒來）主動請纓，要求幫助老師。優香表示同意，但說明眾人一定要保證安全。
desc.jp: 遊戲開發部（愛麗絲尚未醒來）主動請纓，要求幫助老師。優香表示同意，但說明眾人一定要保證安全。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Sensei resumes patrolling with Sena, and they run into Chihiro. Fubuki and Kirino are transporting Wakamo to the Corrections Bureau. Wakamo escapes from the transport truck amidst all the talk of Wakamo's terrifying reputation as the "Fox of Calamity".
desc.jp: Sensei resumes patrolling with Sena, and they run into Chihiro. Fubuki and Kirino are transporting Wakamo to the Corrections Bureau. Wakamo escapes from the transport truck amidst all the talk of Wakamo's terrifying reputation as the "Fox of Calamity".
desc.zh_cn: 继续四处巡逻的老师和{cf瀬奈}，恰巧碰见了前来检查保全设备的{cf千寻}。与此同时，{cf吹雪}和{cf桐乃}正准备将{cf若藻}移送至矫正局。就在{cf吹雪}和{cf桐乃}热烈讨论被称为「灾厄之狐」的{cf若藻}有多么可怕时，{cf若藻}不费吹灰之力便逃出了囚车。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ヴァルキューレ警察学校
ヴァルキューレ警察学校

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

狐坂{cf若藻}的沉默与祝宴

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

name.zh_cn: 狐坂{cf若藻}的沉默与祝宴

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

desc.en: To evade the pursuit of the Ninjutsu Research Club, the Mouryo destroy a bridge. While everyone is panicking, Iroha leads the charge and successfully jumps the tank over the collapsed bridge with everyone.
desc.jp: To evade the pursuit of the Ninjutsu Research Club, the Mouryo destroy a bridge. While everyone is panicking, Iroha leads the charge and successfully jumps the tank over the collapsed bridge with everyone.
desc.zh_cn: 为了甩开{cn忍术研究部}的追击，妖怪剧团只能使出击垮桥梁的最强手段。正当众人都很慌张的时候，{cf伊吕波}为了跳过桥梁，开着坦克和所有人往坍塌的桥梁上突击。

name.en: What Really Stands in Our Way 2
name.jp: What Really Stands in Our Way 2

desc.en: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.jp: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.zh_cn:
为了成为正式的社团，{cn忍术研究部}决定协助{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn格黑娜}的交流会。
然而这两所学园的交流会想必无法风平浪静地结束……
面对眼前各式各样的问题，少女们得出的答案究竟会是什么呢！？

desc.en: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.jp: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.zh_cn:
为了成为正式的社团，{cn忍术研究部}决定协助{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn格黑娜}的交流会。
然而这两所学园的交流会想必无法风平浪静地结束……
面对眼前各式各样的问题，少女们得出的答案究竟会是什么呢！？

desc.en: After the successful exchange meeting, everything goes back to normal. Then Niya appears in front of Sensei and confesses that she plotted everything to see Sensei's skills, and Sensei thoroughly scolds Niya.
desc.jp: After the successful exchange meeting, everything goes back to normal. Then Niya appears in front of Sensei and confesses that she plotted everything to see Sensei's skills, and Sensei thoroughly scolds Niya.
desc.zh_cn: 在交流会顺利结束后，一切都恢复原状。最后出现在老师面前的仁耶坦白说，这次的事情都是为了看到老师的实力而策划的，老师便毫不犹豫训斥仁耶。

desc.en: Hoshino and Sensei are engaged in combat against Wakamo, who arrived on a hovercraft. The remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force use Ayane's helicopter to save the day.
desc.jp: Hoshino and Sensei are engaged in combat against Wakamo, who arrived on a hovercraft. The remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force use Ayane's helicopter to save the day.
desc.zh_cn: 仅凭{cf星野}和老师无法抵挡{cf若藻}，又因为压倒性的战力差距而渐渐陷入困境。但是，{cf星野}的眼神里却丝毫没有放弃。对询问自己为何如此游刃有余的老师，{cf星野}笑着说因为自己相信{cn对策委员会}的大家一定会来。正如{cf星野}所说，结束直升机维修的一行人果真前来救援了。

name.en: The Truth of the Resort Ticket Part 1
name.jp: The Truth of the Resort Ticket Part 1
name.zh_cn: 渡假胜地使用券的真相（１）
{sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

name.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

desc.en: The Arancino Family, a gangster organization, detains a suspected terrorist from a special convoy.
desc.jp: The Arancino Family, a gangster organization, detains a suspected terrorist from a special convoy.
desc.zh_cn: 「阿兰奇诺家族」将一名对他们发动恐怖攻击的通缉犯监禁在特殊车厢上。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Trinity's relic—a relic that could make or break the Tea Party's political fortunes—is on a train headed to Gehenna! Ichika boards the train to retrieve the relic, where she encounters Gehenna's most wanted criminal...!
desc.jp: Trinity's relic—a relic that could make or break the Tea Party's political fortunes—is on a train headed to Gehenna! Ichika boards the train to retrieve the relic, where she encounters Gehenna's most wanted criminal...!
desc.zh_cn:
在将文物移送至{sn三一}的途中，{cf一花}和老师发现委托载运的列车正开往{sn其他}目的地。
匆忙搭上列车后，发现上头竟然有{sn格黑娜}的通缉犯──！？
究竟，大家能平安地将文物带回{sn三一}吗？

desc.en: Trinity's relic—a relic that could make or break the Tea Party's political fortunes—is on a train headed to Gehenna! Ichika boards the train to retrieve the relic, where she encounters Gehenna's most wanted criminal...!
desc.jp: Trinity's relic—a relic that could make or break the Tea Party's political fortunes—is on a train headed to Gehenna! Ichika boards the train to retrieve the relic, where she encounters Gehenna's most wanted criminal...!
desc.zh_cn:
在将文物移送至{sn三一}的途中，{cf一花}和老师发现委托载运的列车正开往{sn其他}目的地。
匆忙搭上列车后，发现上头竟然有{sn格黑娜}的通缉犯──！？
究竟，大家能平安地将文物带回{sn三一}吗？

name.en: The Good, The Bad, The Trinity 1
name.jp: The Good, The Bad, The Trinity 1
name.zh_cn: The good, The bad, The trinity（１）

desc.en: The Gehenna Prefect Team and Iori board the train and are met by Ichika, Sensei, and Kasumi.
desc.jp: The Gehenna Prefect Team and Iori board the train and are met by Ichika, Sensei, and Kasumi.
desc.zh_cn: {cf伊织}对过站不停的列车起了疑心，决定登上列车。他们和以第一节车厢为目标的老师等人相遇了。

hobby.jp: パトロール、大声を出すこと

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

hobby.en: 人助け、色々手を出している最中
hobby.jp: 人助け、色々手を出している最中
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 帮助他人、各种动手的时候
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 人助け、色々手を出している最中
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 帮助他人、各种动手的时候

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.jp: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第101首曲子，在最终篇第三章占领方舟的活动战斗任务里使用。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

long.jp: ヴァルキューレ警察学校
ヴァルキューレ警察学校

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
